alert.note: Alert for Southern Monterey Bay and Big Sur Coast (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 29 at 4:17PM PDT by NWS Monterey
info.description: ...A shower producing small hail will impact portions of west central Monterey County through 445 PM PDT... At 416 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a shower producing small hail over Carmel-By-The-Sea, or near Monterey, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Seaside, Monterey, Marina, Carmel-By-The-Sea, Del Monte Forest, Del Rey Oaks and Sand City. This includes Highway 1 between Mile Markers 71 and 75. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Southern Monterey Bay and Big Sur Coast
